languages.text: "Сколько золотого и белого..." {n}Кассия зачарованно взирает на толпу. Похоже, для нее столь масштабное собрание ликующих людей выглядит столь же экзотично и захватывающе, как и для ваших подданных — зрелище настоящего {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g}, представительницы загадочных и могучих {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}.{/n}

"So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сколько золотого и белого..." {n}Кассия зачарованно взирает на толпу. Похоже, для нее столь масштабное собрание ликующих людей выглядит столь же экзотично и захватывающе, как и для ваших подданных — зрелище настоящего {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g}, представительницы загадочных и могучих {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}.{/n}

It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

"So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

languages.text: 「なんと多くの金と白でしょうか…」{n}カシアは群衆を見つめて恍惚としている。謎に包まれた強力な{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}であり、本物の実力を持つ{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の視界をあなたの臣下が見て感じる想いと同様に、カシアにとってこの光景は実に魅力的かつ心揺さぶられるものなのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんと多くの金と白でしょうか…」{n}カシアは群衆を見つめて恍惚としている。謎に包まれた強力な{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}であり、本物の実力を持つ{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の視界をあなたの臣下が見て感じる想いと同様に、カシアにとってこの光景は実に魅力的かつ心揺さぶられるものなのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: “多么耀眼的金色与白色啊……”{n}卡西娅兴奋地四下张望。对她而言，看到这么一大群欢天喜地的人聚在一起，她激动的心情丝毫不亚于你的臣民亲眼目睹{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}神秘而高贵的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}出现在他们面前。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “多么耀眼的金色与白色啊……”{n}卡西娅兴奋地四下张望。对她而言，看到这么一大群欢天喜地的人聚在一起，她激动的心情丝毫不亚于你的臣民亲眼目睹{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}神秘而高贵的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}出现在他们面前。{/n}

languages.text: «Tanto blanco y dorado...». {n}Cassia mira a la muchedumbre, extasiada. Parece que ver al gentío regocijarse le resulta tan exótico y cautivador como el verla a ella, una auténtica {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}, representante de la misteriosa y poderosa {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, resulta para tus súbditos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tanto blanco y dorado...». {n}Cassia mira a la muchedumbre, extasiada. Parece que ver al gentío regocijarse le resulta tan exótico y cautivador como el verla a ella, una auténtica {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}, representante de la misteriosa y poderosa {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, resulta para tus súbditos.{/n}

languages.text: « Tant d'or et de blanc... » {n}Fascinée, Cassia ne semble pas pouvoir détacher son regard de la foule. Ce gigantesque rassemblement est aussi exotique et attrayant pour elle que la présence d'une authentique {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigatrice{/g}, représentante de la mystérieuse {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, pour vos sujets.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tant d'or et de blanc... » {n}Fascinée, Cassia ne semble pas pouvoir détacher son regard de la foule. Ce gigantesque rassemblement est aussi exotique et attrayant pour elle que la présence d'une authentique {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigatrice{/g}, représentante de la mystérieuse {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, pour vos sujets.{/n}

languages.text: "So viel Gold und Weiß ..." {n}Cassia starrt fasziniert auf die Menge. Anscheinend ist die enorme Ansammlung jubelnder Menschen für sie ebenso exotisch und aufregend wie der Anblick einer echten {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatorin{/g}, einer Vertreterin der geheimnisvollen und mächtigen {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, für deine Untertanen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So viel Gold und Weiß ..." {n}Cassia starrt fasziniert auf die Menge. Anscheinend ist die enorme Ansammlung jubelnder Menschen für sie ebenso exotisch und aufregend wie der Anblick einer echten {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatorin{/g}, einer Vertreterin der geheimnisvollen und mächtigen {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, für deine Untertanen.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunca altın, bunca beyaz..." {n}Cassia, mest olmuş bir şekilde kalabalığa bakıyor. Sevinçten havalara uçan kitlelere şahitlik etmek, gizemli ve güçlü {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite'nin{/g} temsilcisi olan kanlı canlı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} görmek kadar egzotik ve büyüleyici olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So much gold and white..." {n}Cassia stares at the crowd, enraptured. It seems this massive gathering of exulting people is just as exotic and captivating to her as the sight of a bona fide {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, a representative of the mysterious and powerful {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}, is to your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bunca altın, bunca beyaz..." {n}Cassia, kalabalığa mest olmuş bir şekilde bakıyor. Sevinçten havalara uçan kitlelere şahitlik etmek de gizemli ve güçlü {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}'nin temsilcisi olan kanlı canlı bir {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} görmek kadar egzotik ve büyüleyici anlaşılan.{/n}
